Alex McKinley
Sr. Marketing Communications Manager at AAPC
January 13, 2017, Alex reported directly to Bray

I worked for Bray for nearly two years at AAPC. He has a broad knowledge of marketing and spoke with confidence towards my specialty—marketing communications. He collaborates well and never lets ego get in the way of objectives and relationships. Bray unified the team and we mutually worked towards meeting our goals each month. He wanted me to succeed personally and professionally. Bray handled the pressure of being our marketing leader with a calm confidence. He faced lofty goals and managed a split marketing team, where half of the staff worked internationally. He was never openly perplexed or acted reactively to challenging situations. He genuinely sought to do what was best for the situation and congenially defended his position based on experience and expertise. He listened to every suggestion objectively. I would recommend Bray as a marketing leader/executive and hope my path crosses with his again in the future.

That sets him aside from the other marketing professionals I have worked with on the companies I had owned or the companies I had worked for. summary: Executive B2B and B2C marketing management professional with 20 years successful experience providing vision and overall leadership direction for all marketing activities. Leading the design, development, promotion, and communication of marketing strategies and tactics – ensuring marketing profitability (ROI), competitiveness, effective positioning, message targeting, and organizational efficiency.Extensive experience in successfully leading marketing for technology, software, SaaS, elearning, healthcare, and fintech (financial technology) companies.Specialties: – Development and Execution of all marketing (digital and non-digital) disciplines and vehicles: Marketing and Brand Strategy – Brand Development and Management – Product Marketing – Community Development – Internet and Website Marketing – Demand Generation –Lead Generation – Business Development – Channel Development – Communications – Crisis Communications – Marketing Metrics – Strategic Partnerships – P&L – Team Leadership – Project Management – Demand Generation – Digital Marketing –  Sales Channel Development – Cloud – SaaS – PaaS – IaaS – SMB – Enterprise
